description:
Don’t let slippage stand in the way of solving your latest problem. This little bottle of liquid chalk is great for indoor bouldering sessions, or heading to the crag. Midnight Lightning’s liquid chalk goes on easily, dries quickly, and has a subtle citrus smell.

  • Rosin-free formula
  • Low-waste packaging uses 60% less materials and energy
  • Carabiner clip makes it easy to bring this little bottle along
  • Vegan formula contains 70% isopropyl alcohol
name: Midnight Lightning Refillable Liquid Chalk Bottle 50ml
